text: sihamte allahara sapata lai kaya ye, sihamte eko koraa na'i; athaca sihamte kupharai bakya kaiche arau ichalama grahanara pichata akau kupharai karaiche; sihamte enekuraa sankalpa karaichila yito sihamte poraa na'i. Allaha arau te'omra raachule nija anugrahata sihamtaka (muchalimasakalaka) abharamukta karaichila buliye sihamte (kaphira munaphikasakale) biraodhita karaichila. Eteke yadi sihamte ta'oba karae tente sihamtara babe bhala ha’ba, arau sihamte mukha ghuraa'i la’le allahe prthiraita arau akhiraatata sihamtaka yantranadayaka sasti diba; arau prthiraita sihamtara kono abhibharaka na'i arau na'i kono sahayyakarai'o
